definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素类似物会改善我的糖尿病治疗计划吗？

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地区内的扶轮社在社员发展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: This initiative helped improve registration of births and deaths at the subdistrict level.
sentences.chinese: 这一举措帮助改善了街道一级的出生和死亡登记。

sentences.english: We are starting to see some initial signs of improvement.
sentences.chinese: 我们开始看到一些改善的初步迹象。

sentences.english: The function of pronation and supination of the forearm was improved.
sentences.chinese: 前臂的旋前和旋后功能得到明显改善。

sentences.english: Relaxing foods can enhance your mood and state of mind.
sentences.chinese: 放松食品可以改善你的情绪和精神状态。

sentences.english: Further features will be encorporated in the final version.
sentences.chinese: 正式版中还会有进一步改善。

sentences.english: Is there any way I can improve my memory?
sentences.chinese: 有没有什么方法可以改善我的记忆力？

sentences.english: How do these issues influence the implementation and improvement of BASIX?
sentences.chinese: 这些问题是怎样影响BASIX的实施和改善的？

sentences.english: Group messaging is also going to be vastly improved.
sentences.chinese: 群发短信功能也将大加改善。

sentences.english: Voll says cooperating in education is fundamental to better relations between the U.S. and the Muslim world.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔说，教育合作是美国改善与穆斯林关系的基础。

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子筛预先经碱处理，能够明显改善催化剂稳定性。

sentences.english: Vigorously improve forest inhabitant people's livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 大力保障和改善林区民生。

sentences.english: Design improvement is one effect of using stubs.
sentences.chinese: 改善设计是使用残根的一项效果。

sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the effect of emotion nursing to improve post-stroke depression for cerebral apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨情志护理对改善脑卒中后病人的抑郁状态效果。
改善产前和围产期护理。

definition: to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to improve/to take a turn for the better/improvement
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
change of appearance/to revise one's point of view
to reinstate/to resume/to restore/to recover/to regain/to rehabilitate
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
